snippet: More than half of female Marines in boot camp cannot do three pull-ups, the minimum standard that was supposed to take effect with the new year.
abstract: More than half of female Marines in boot camp cannot do three pull-ups, minimum standard that was supposed to take effect with in 2014; Marine Corp is delaying requirement.
lead_paragraph: More than half of female Marines in boot camp cannot do three pull-ups, the minimum standard that was supposed to take effect with the new year.

headline.main: Marines Delay Strength Requirement for Women
headline.print_headline: Marines Delay Strength Requirement For Women
